parameters.name: MethodName
parameters.description: Name of the application function used to save the file as specified in ISldWorks::AddFileSaveAsItem2

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: File description in the Save as type list

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document to save as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

title: ISldWorks.RemoveFileSaveAsItem2
description: Removes a file type from the File > Save As dialog box that was added using ISldWorks::AddFileSaveAsItem2.
signature:
System.Boolean RemoveFileSaveAsItem2( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.String
MethodName
,
   System.String
Description
,
   System.String
Extension
,
   System.Int32
DocumentType
)

parameters.name: MethodName
parameters.description: Name of the application function used to save the file as specified in ISldWorks::AddFileSaveAsItem2

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: File description in the Save as type list

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document to save as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

returns: True if the file type is removed from the Save as type list, false if not
remarks: Call this method in your add-in's DisconnectFromSW method.
